snippet: The Pirates bolstered their bullpen on Monday, agreeing to an $11 million, two-year contract with reliever Daniel Hudson....
lead_paragraph: The Pirates bolstered their bullpen on Monday, agreeing to an $11 million, two-year contract with reliever Daniel Hudson.

headline.main: Daniel Hudson, Pirates Agree to $11M Million, 2-Year Deal
headline.print_headline: Daniel Hudson, Pirates Agree to $11M Million, 2-Year Deal
